title: 1-minute Teams meeting held on 4G network with camera disabled
description:
An experiment was made on the amount of data transfered in a Microsoft Teams meeting with cameras-on vs off.

A total of 9 meetings of between 30 and 60 minutes were conducted using a 4G connection via a mobile phone, which allowed data usage to be tracked using the mobile application of the RedBySFR network provider.

When the camera was turned off, the average data throughput was 8.76 MB per minute.
